overview_description.description: SunCulture is a company based in Nairobi, Kenya which sells the AgroSolar Irrigation Kit, an entirely solar-powered drip irrigation system. The kit combines solar water pumping technology with high-efficiency drip irrigation and includes everything a farmer needs to grow more while spending less, in a sustainable and energy-efficient way. SunCulture has developed a novel and unique product that simplifies farming and increases crop yields. They are also the only "one-stop shop" for Kenyan farmers, as they provide a solar water pumping solution, an entire drip irrigation kit, agronomic services, educational training, access to capital and access to markets in rural Kenya â€“Â their approach focuses on quality of both product and services.

about_short_description.short_description: SunCulture develops & commercializes life-changing technology to solve the biggest daily challenges for the world's smallholder farmers

product.name: RainMaker2 with ClimateSmart™ Battery
product.description: A solar-powered irrigation solution for up to 2 acres, including a submersible pump, solar panel, HDPE pipe, sprinklers, LED lights, USB charging ports, and optional TV and drip irrigation system.

product.name: ClimateSmart™ Battery + TV
product.description: A system powered by a 444Wh lithium-ion battery supporting over 20 hours of TV runtime, including a solar panel, LED bulbs, and a 32" digital LED TV.

product.name: RainMaker2C Kubwa
product.description: An irrigation solution optimized for up to 2 acres, featuring a submersible pump, solar panels, HDPE pipe, and necessary fittings.

product.name: Direct Drip Irrigation - Addon
product.description: A drip irrigation system including 500M of drip irrigation tape, HDPE pipe, a pressure regulator valve, filtration system, connectors, valves, and fittings.

product.name: Refurbished RainMaker2 with ClimateSmart™ Battery
product.description: A refurbished version of the RainMaker2 with ClimateSmart™ Battery, offering the same features at a reduced price.

product.name: Refurbished ClimateSmart™ Direct
product.description: A refurbished, cost-effective irrigation solution for up to 1 acre, including a submersible pump, electric cable, controller, solar panel, and HDPE pipe.
